@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that throw on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, throws on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers, truncating the quotient.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, throws on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, throws on overflow.

ERC20Basic

attributes.documentation:
@title ZCVesting

 * Used to hold tokens and release once configured amount has been released to consumers.
 * 10% of initial tokens in contract can be claimed for every 15 million tokens that are distributed to consumers.
After 150 million tokens are distributed consumer the full balanceof the vesting contract is transferable.
 * (c) Philip Louw / Zero Carbon Project 2018. The MIT Licence.
attributes.name: ZCVesting

attributes.documentation:
@dev Event when Tokens are released
@param releaseAmount Amount of tokens released
attributes.name: TokenReleased

attributes.documentation: @dev Releases the current allowed amount to the releaseAddress. Returns the amount released
attributes.name: release

attributes.documentation: @dev Returns the token balance of this ZCVesting contract
attributes.name: currentBalance
